ygData.subject: Re: Newbie needs some help
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. You no longer lose XP at 5. This was patched a good while ago, but I d be hard pressed to say exactly when. 2. This was in a more recent patch.
ygData.messageBody:
1. You no longer lose XP at 5. This was patched a
good while ago, but I'd be hard pressed to say exactly
when.<br><br>2. This was in a more recent patch. Verant's
reasoning (and a sound one, amazingly) was that Delevelers
in PvP were ruining the game for new players. By
putting this in place, they effectively cancelled out the
only good side-effect of deleveling.<br><br>3.
According to Absor, on EQ's Developer's Corner (Check under
Feedback at www.everquest.com), you haven't been able to
buff/heal an NPC since Beta testing. I haven't been around
that long, so I can't confirm that. But I'd assume an
employee of Verant, especially Absor, would
know.<br><br>4. Well, it's entirely possible those Kodiaks were
on a different faction (Unkempt druids, maybe?). I
know that I have to be careful in Rathe Mountains as a
Ranger because the bears there are scowling at
me.<br><br>Tyral Stormfang<br>Commander of the Knights of
Prophecy<br>Lanys T'Vyl
